plot: After defeating Desler, the crew of the Yamato go their separate ways. The Earth is finally beginning to rebuild itself, till Shima and Sanada pick up a transmission from a woman named Theresa about a white comet which destroys everything in its path. Carrying out mutiny, Yamato launches from Earth to face an enemy, against which even the Wave Motion Gun is of no use.
